lender.name: Caitlyn
lender.loan_because: Kiva is a good cause. I'd also like to help make the world a better place:).

lender.name: The Chicas
lender.loan_because: We are a group of young women who are connected to the international community through our life experiences and work. We are also social-justice oriented, and are heartened by the fact that even a small loan can sometimes make a big difference.

lender.name: Ean
lender.loan_because: I see the impact of funding on small businesses every day!

lender.name: Jillian
lender.loan_because: To help other people

lender.name: Sarah
lender.loan_because: I loan because I can. I have a good life and it is my duty to share what I have.

lender.name: Spencer
lender.loan_because: Because people need money more than me.

lender.name: G. K.
lender.loan_because: Provides borrowers means to reach goals while retaining their pride of accomplishment.
lender.occupational_info: MLS Graduate Student

lender.name: Terry
lender.loan_because: I received a very thoughtful and purposeful gift and am honored to be able to pass it on in order to help others make a difference in their lives. There are so many people in this world who need a helping hand and I feel that we all have an obligation to be there for each other.
lender.occupational_info: I help raise money for a non-profit (NGO) that saves animals and their habitats through conservation leadership and engaging experiences inspiring people to learn, care and act.

lender.name: Stephen
lender.loan_because:
The Bible says in Proverbs 21:13 (NIV) that..."If a man shuts his ears to the cry of the poor, he too will cry out and not be answered."
I was born in Ghana and migrated to Canada as a young adult. My un-educated single-parent mother had no opportunity to borrow from the bank to start a trade. It is often difficult to raise capital to commence any form of trade in a poor or developing country if you do not have a significant collateral.
Today, I consider myself blessed and I would like to make an impact on other people's lives by helping out with the little that I can.
lender.occupational_info: I am an Information Technology professional - or a computer programmer. Presently, I manage a team of computer professionals who develop websites on the internet.

lender.name: larry
lender.loan_because: I love people who have the guts to become entrepeneurs!
lender.occupational_info: I host a radio show called The JOB that helps people with their jobs.

lender.name: Simon
lender.loan_because: Two years in the Peace Corps made me feel that the best way help developing countries is by encouraging small-scale entrepreneurs.
lender.occupational_info: I am studying for my PhD in Biology, and teach part-time.

lender.name: Steven
lender.loan_because: I admire the entrepreneurial spirit of small business owners ... and every little bit helps.

lender.name: Jill
lender.loan_because: i want to help other women to realize their potential and help promote gender equality.
lender.occupational_info: i stay at home with my daughter and teach at her school.

lender.name: Chantal
lender.loan_because: we are meant to uplift and empower eachother - this is the whole point of our journey on Earth

lender.name: Tori
lender.loan_because: There are women who are trying to make something of their lives.

lender.name: Sarah
lender.loan_because: I want to help people!
lender.occupational_info: I take classes at a college to get ready for nursing school and I volunteer at a local hospital.

lender.name: Terri
lender.loan_because: My heart tells me to.
lender.occupational_info: I help make lunches for school children.

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because: I care & I Believe in people !

lender.name: Melinda
lender.occupational_info: I am a full time nursing student, and I work lifeguarding at the pool at my college to help pay for my college.

lender.name: kristian
lender.occupational_info: I work with switching hospital workers from paperwork to working on computer

lender.name: Amanda
lender.loan_because: I understand financial hardship very well. If I'm struggling then I can only imagine how much harder it is for someone who may not have access to the same opportunities as I do.
lender.occupational_info: I am in graduate school to earn my Master's degree. I work as a teacher, DJ, and cashier.

lender.name: Klaus
lender.loan_because: I believe in microfunding as a concept and believe Kiva is a great idea.
lender.occupational_info: National Chairman of Social Liberal political party in Denmark

lender.name: Jaquelin
lender.loan_because: I want to help budding entrepreneurs become successful.

lender.name: Donna
lender.loan_because: to pay it forward...
lender.occupational_info: Manage the information stored in large computer systems. I am also a Master Gardener.

lender.name: James
lender.loan_because: I have been given much, and it's right to present others with an opportunity.

lender.name: Amir
lender.occupational_info: I am a family doctor.

lender.name: Jesse
lender.loan_because: It's the least I can do.
lender.occupational_info: I go to school.

lender.name: Whitney Stone
lender.loan_because: Kiva is brilliant. I want to be part of a peer to peer lending global revolution. I loan to women in food service and I try to choose a new country each time I loan. I give Kiva cards as gifts for birthdays and holidays encourage loved ones to do the same.
lender.occupational_info: I am a wine broker, I work with private clients however, I believe everyone deserves to enjoy beautiful small production wines. I enjoy sharing wine with novices and collectors alike.

lender.name: Patricia
lender.loan_because: I want to help
lender.occupational_info: I seek government and private grants for causes related to women, seniors and mentally disabled.

lender.name: Prue
lender.loan_because: There are many people around the globe that need capital to start a business. I will lend the money to African bussiness peesons as I believe that they need it most.
lender.occupational_info: I researched the effects of Chinese investments in Africa and found very positive feed-back from the African part. I have also worked for a transport company in Africa, and researched economic issues in the same time.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: I have a young family of 3 kids ages 7,6,3 and I want to start my own home base business so I have some money to pay for my kids education in the coming years.
lender.occupational_info: Computer sales person

lender.name: Foothill Elementary
lender.loan_because: We are helping people in Africa by raising funds for mosquito nets (www.nothingbutnets.net) and we also want to help people there in other ways
lender.occupational_info: We are a community service group of elementary age kids at our school in Boulder, Colorado USA

lender.name: Amanda
lender.loan_because: Instead of helping one person or one family, the money goes to help an entire community; besides that, it's not charity. As the adage goes, it is "teaching a man to fish."
lender.occupational_info: I am a full time student and work part time taking care of children.

lender.name: Hkon
lender.loan_because: I want to give a helping hand to someone who needs financial support to develop their business, and by doing so it wil hopefully make their lives a little better.
lender.occupational_info: I work as a Film Director and Screenwriter.

lender.name: Mohammed
lender.loan_because: charity, even so it is well, but if ye conceal them, and make them reach those (really) in need, that is best for you: It will remove from you some of your (stains of) evil. And Allah is well acquainted with what ye do

lender.name: Laura
lender.loan_because: I think everyone deserves a chance to make it.
lender.occupational_info: I help manage reputations and relationships for companies, products and people.

lender.name: Mariell
lender.loan_because: I want to help others help themselves
lender.occupational_info: I study to be a Biomedical laboratory scientist and will graduate in the spring 2010.

lender.name: Ginger
lender.loan_because: A nonprofit, federally tax-exempt, mutual benefit Veterans Service Organization providing financial protection to sea service members and families since 1879. Life Insurance, annuities, benefit education to US Navy, USMC, USCG, PHS, NOAA, and more.

lender.name: Diana
lender.loan_because: at some point in our lives, we all rely on the goodness of others. en cualquier punto en nuestras vidas, necesitamos contar con la bondad de otros
lender.occupational_info: studying international relations and economic development estudiante de relaciones internacionales y desarrollo economico

lender.loan_because: i care

lender.occupational_info: Retired

lender.name: tobias
lender.loan_because: everyone needs a little help sometimes !
lender.occupational_info: Professionally, I design buildings.

lender.name: Mike
lender.loan_because: I believe in the cause. Making a plan is tough. Doing it is even tougher. With this, I have nothing to lose, but at least someone else has something great to gain. Good luck!
lender.occupational_info: I go to school and pay for college myself. It's rough sometimes, but I seem to make it by. I go to classes in the day and work at night. So all my needs are met. I love helping anyone and everyone who just needs a bit of a push out the door and a pat on the back.

lender.name: Marion
lender.loan_because: I would like to work with the micro credit in the future...I think its a very interesting way of creating a new future where everybody can get involved
lender.occupational_info: I am a recent business graduate currently unemployed

lender.name: Anne
lender.loan_because: It's fun and rewarding!
lender.occupational_info: My work involves helping others with issues that may arise at the workplace and ensuring we have the right people in the right places at the right time and at the right price to deliver that work.

lender.name: The Underground
lender.loan_because: I want to share the Gospel of Jesus Christ by sharing what he has given to me.
lender.occupational_info: The Underground is NOT your average Christian magazine.

lender.name: Fred
lender.loan_because: We want to help people in their business project in poor countries

lender.name: Lisa
lender.loan_because: it is important for people to look out for one another.
lender.occupational_info: I am a mortgage broker in Canada. I help people get affordable loans to purchase homes.

lender.name: Margaret
lender.loan_because: I believe it's important for people to work together for everyone's success.
lender.occupational_info: I make educational readings available to students at the university where I work in the library. I make the readings accessible, which means that people who cannot see or read a document will have the document read to them by their computer.

lender.name: Adilson
lender.loan_because: I want to modify the history of lfe of someone far far away from me.

lender.name: Tatiana
lender.loan_because: its the best thing to do :)

lender.name: Robin
lender.loan_because: It makes me happy.

lender.name: Ricky
lender.loan_because: there's no better way to spend my money I've been blessed with.
lender.occupational_info: I am a college student and part-time carpenter.

lender.loan_because: Isaiah 1:17. Learn to do good: Seek justice, rescue the oppressed, defend the orphan, plead for the widow.

lender.name: Jonathan & Bosco
lender.loan_because: a healthy sustainable planet benefits all.
lender.occupational_info: I focus on keeping electronics out of the landfill and from being shipped out of the United States to another country.

lender.name: barbara

lender.occupational_info: I tell stories.

lender.occupational_info: I am a social worker for Child Potective Services (CPS). I monitor children's welfare and montior the progress of parental protective capacities.

lender.name: Zack
lender.loan_because: I enjoy helping those who are needing help in parts of the world.

lender.name: Trevor
lender.loan_because: I heard about Kiva and micro credit in my Sociology class and thought it was a great way for people around the world to help other struggling entrepeneurs directly without going through the bureacractic hoops of a larger organization.

lender.name: Angus
lender.loan_because: I like the idea of truly making a difference in people's lives in a practical way
lender.occupational_info: I provide training and sales materials to customers to help them understand and use pharmaceutical products more effectively

lender.name: Don
lender.loan_because: I think it's the right thing to do. I don't have a lot, but I have enough to help others.
lender.occupational_info: I am a History student in college looking forward to becoming a teacher

lender.name: Ron
lender.loan_because: I am personally interested in seeing lives changed and developing economies transformed.

lender.name: Melody

lender.occupational_info: I am an international traveler with a love for life. I work in whatever field interest me at the moment from event management to admin to political consultant. I aspire to one day to start a small business.

lender.name: Paulo
lender.loan_because: I was fortunate to have been born in a developed country and have had so much made available to me. I want to help make resources available to those who were not quite as fortunate.
lender.occupational_info: I am a technical guy working on new technologies, especially for communicating and sharing information across the world. Things like computers, web sites, phones, and such. I want to make it easier for people to communicate and understand each other.

lender.occupational_info: I'm an entrepreneur myself and started my own freelance art business in 2007. I specialize in Fine art and illustrations for any sort of artwork related service.

lender.loan_because: why not?!

lender.loan_because: Other people in Holland gave me a loan to do business.
lender.occupational_info: I run a company of 9 people that sell clothes.

lender.name: Kyle
lender.loan_because: I care about people and want to help others make their dreams come true. God blessed me to be a blessing to others, and I pray that my loans bless them in such a way that, they will become the blessing for someone else.
lender.occupational_info: I am a former US Marine so I have seen first hand how a little from us can go far for someone else.
